titleStmt.title: Murther revealed, or, A voyce from the grave faithfully relating the deplorable death of Dr. John Hewit, late of St. Gregories London, with severall queries propounded to the consciences of his bloody tryers / by a true Englishman.
titleStmt.author: True Englishman.
Hewit, John, 1614-1658.

notesStmt.note: Includes Hewit's "Letter to Doctor Wilde" (p. 6) and "His speech upon the scaffold" (p. 8-[1])
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
